alert.note: Alert for Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:53PM EDT until August 07 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR LAWRENCE...SOUTHEASTERN CARTER AND CENTRAL WAYNE COUNTIES... At 253 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Webbville, or near Yatesville Lake State Park, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Blaine, Yatesville Lake State Park, Fort Gay, Webbville, Denton, Ulysses, Charley, Kiahsville, Dunlow, Martha, Gallup, Clifford, Glenhayes, Willard, Houckville, Fallsburg, and Genoa. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for northeastern Kentucky...and western West Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
